ca.cgjennings.io.protocols

Class CapturedStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.io.protocols.CapturedStream

  • public class CapturedStream
extends Object
    Stores a stream of bytes captured at some previous point in time. This is used by some URL connection handlers to implement memory-based caches.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CapturedStream(byte[] data) 
      CapturedStream(String data) 

    • Method Summary

      Returns the bytes in the captured stream as a shared array.

      Returns the number of bytes in the captured stream.

    • Method Detail

      • getStreamContent

        public byte[] getStreamContent()
        Returns the bytes in the captured stream as a shared array. Callers must not modify the returned array.
        Returns:
        the non-null stream content

      • getStreamLength

        public int getStreamLength()
        Returns the number of bytes in the captured stream.
        Returns:
        the stream length
